name: made-with-collection
description: Badge image provider for softwares and technologies based on simple-icons

scripts.build: babel src -d dist && uglifyjs dist/made-with-module.js -c -m reserved=['img','text','div'] -o dist/made-with-module.min.js && uglifyjs dist/made-with.js -c -m reserved=['img','text','div'] -o dist/made-with.min.js

author: Robin B <robin@codeon.fr>
